value: Ordeal Foes Defeated
Win and earn Dragonflowers!

Heroic Ordeals:
Fight on a map specific to each
Hero. If the Hero undertaking this
trial defeats at least two foes and
you clear the battle, you will earn
Dragonflowers.

Team Makeup:
You must bring the Hero
undertaking the ordeal
plus one additional ally.

Clear Conditions:
The Hero undertaking the ordeal
must defeat at least two foes.
Both allies must survive.

One-Time Boost:
Once a day, any allies
undertaking a Heroic Ordeal will
enjoy a boost to their stats until
a map has been cleared:
HP+10, Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4.

Continuing:
When you get a Game Over, you
can use a Light's Blessing or Orbs
to continue playing.

You will still need to meet the
regular victory conditions (such as
defeating two foes with the Hero
facing the ordeal) to clear the
map.

Note:
Heroic Ordeals do not grant EXP,
SP, HM, etc.

Greil's Request
2nd Anniversary

Aether:
This is used to take part in Aether
Raids. It's replenished by a fixed
amount once a day. It is totally
replenished at the start of a new
season. Note: It cannot be
replenished beyond the maximum
amount. The higher your Lift, the
more Aether you'll need to battle
(to a maximum of 50.)

Escape Ladder (O):
If the date changes and your
Aether is filled to its maximum
when Aether is consumed,
the number of uses for this
structure will not decrease if
an attack fails.

Permanent Structures:
Fortresses and resources cannot
be removed.

Destroying Structures:
Fortresses cannot be destroyed.
Other structures can be
destroyed with a single attack.
Heroic Ordeals
Obtain Dragonflowers here.
Choose an ally to undertake this trial.
About Heroes
Boost stats with Dragonflowers!

Dragonflowers:
Use Dragonflowers to increase
the stats of your allies.

Dragonflowers can be obtained in
Aether Raids and Heroic Ordeals.

Stat Increase Limits:
Each ally can have their stats
increased a limited number of
times.

Arena Effects:
Increases from Dragonflowers
do not influence how stats are
treated for opponent selection
in modes like Arena.

Merge Allies Effects:
If two characters that have both
had Dragonflowers used on them
are merged, only the larger of the
two increases will remain after the
merge.
